title: That's a Crafty Idea!
body:
This summer we'll be showing the indie doc HANDMADE NATION about indie craft shows and DIY-ers. So, in the spirit of indie craft shows (think The Renegade Craft Fair, Strange Folk, etc), we decided to have a mini craft show in The Moxie's lobby!

This is a call to all our crafty customers out there. Got a hidden talent for making something special and unique that you want to sell? Learn more at the craft show blog and sign up! If you mention this blog post in the application, we'll extend the deadline until April 9. Spaces are limited, though, so let us know soon.
author: Nicole
